title: In-Depth Inquiry into Electromagnetic Induction via Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Designed for in-service elementary school teachers to acquire methods for visualizing abstract electromagnetic phenomena using VR technology

learning_goals: Explain the correlation between coil rotation speed and voltage generation in VR simulations with over 80% accuracy
Develop two or more real classroom scenarios using VR content that models electromagnetic induction in 3D space
Confirm through experimental data that immersion indices measured in VR learning environments increase by 20% or more compared to computer simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
